title: How are BTS's Japanese pronunciation? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are more or less fluent in Japanese and in their Japanese version music videos, they always seem solid! I myself don't speak Japanese though my close friend does and she says whenever she has heard them speak, she would easily say they sound like a local with a slight twang on their accents, especially Jimin but in terms of pronunciation - they are clear as glass!
